/opt/rocks/bin/rocks add host attr localhost LM_webserver value=true
# mapserver home is for temp files /bin/mkdir -p /var/www/tmp /bin/chown apache:apache /var/www/tmp
/opt/lifemapper/rocks/bin/initWebserver
# Lifemapper webserver umask 002
/sbin/service httpd restart
